home.title: The future of commerce.
home.h-paragraph: A popular idea of late has been to have leaders focus on developing their strengths and largely ignore their weaknesses. When is that good advice? For the second and third groups, or those leaders without any detracting weakness.

aboutUs.h-paragraph: NOA's main mission is to create a platform of services to promote the inclusion of both small and large enterprises, providing services throughout the country, with easy access for users.
aboutUs.v-paragraph: NOA's vision is to provide people with access to an easy, fast and secure service, as well as to allow people to have an equal opportunity in the face of business polarization.
aboutUs.m-paragraph: In order to pro-actively guide our functions, we have efficiency and effectiveness in mind, seeking constant improvement, inclusion and approach to the world, so innovation and connection is the value that best reflects NOA.
